subsection.name: Overview
subsection.p:
Mavento was started to achieve continous integration for Magento projects, but has since matured into a solid dev-toolkit for Magento developers of all kind. The maven-magento-plugin provides Magento specific goals which you can plug into the Maven build life cycle or run from any shell. The magento-archetypes provide ready to run Maven projects configured for Magento development.
Maven is a software project management and comprehension tool that aims at providing a uniform and easy build process. It is very popular in the Java world, but can handle any type of project.
A list of things why people like Maven can be found on the Maven site.

ul.li: Keep your source files separated from the Magento runtime at all time.
Consistent development environment between all involved devs.
PHP code validation/unit tests via maven-php-plugin.
Flexible automated Magento setup for unit/integration tests.
Create snapshots of running Magento instances to be used as base for testing/development.
Less boilerplate Magento code to write with ready to run module templates and code snippets.
Multi module support for bigger projects. Reactorbuilds. <3
Dead easy project integration into CI servers like Jenkins.
